original_text: Or if anyone is holding a stone and strikes someone a fatal blow with it, that person is a murderer; the murderer is to be put to death.
korean_text: 만일 사람을 죽일 만한 돌을 손에 들고 사람을 쳐죽이면 이는 살인한 자니 그 살인자는 반드시 죽일 것이요

sentences.original_text: Or if anyone is holding a stone
and strikes someone a fatal blow with it
the murderer is to be put to death
